description: AI-powered tool breaking complex contracts into smaller elements
title: Lawformer
introduction: Lawformer is an AI-powered tool designed to simplify the process of drafting complex legal documents by breaking them into smaller elements. It offers an extensive database of attorney-drafted clauses and a learning platform to develop practical skills in contract drafting.
features: AI-powered tool for breaking complex contracts into smaller elements
Learning platform for practical skills in contract drafting
Create a personal library from existing contracts
Manage contract knowledge by pulling clauses into new contracts
Find relevant contract clauses using attorney-drafted clauses
targetPeople: Law students, legal professionals, compliance teams, startups, and businesses involved in contract drafting

faqs.question: What is Lawformer?
faqs.answer: Lawformer is an AI-powered tool designed to simplify the process of drafting complex legal documents by breaking them into smaller elements.

faqs.question: What features does Lawformer offer?
faqs.answer: Lawformer offers an extensive library of attorney-drafted clauses, a learning platform for practical skills in contract drafting, and tools to create a personal library from existing contracts, manage contract knowledge, and find relevant contract clauses.

faqs.question: Who can benefit from using Lawformer?
faqs.answer: Law students, legal professionals, compliance teams, startups, and businesses involved in contract drafting can benefit from using Lawformer.
